scenario_data.title: A trader approaches your town.
scenario_data.greeting: Hello __town_name__! I'm just passing through, but even I can see you have a somewhat-skilled crafter in your ranks.
scenario_data.trade_details: If you make me __want_number__ __want_item__(s), I'll be back in __num_days__ days and might be able to get you __reward_number__ __reward_item__(s) in exchange. Sound good?
scenario_data.return_greetings_positive: I'm back! It looks like you've made me the __want_number__ __want_item__(s) I asked for. Are you still willing to trade them to me? I'll give you __reward_number__ __reward_item__(s) in exchange. Still sounds good?
scenario_data.return_greetings_negative: I'm back, but it doesn't look like you've got the __want_number__ __want_item__(s) I asked for. That's too bad! Maybe next time!
